resources.string: Here is your fortune, my friend.
I\'ve seen all I want to see
In order for me to read your fortune with the cards, I must first get to know a little bit about you. Please tell me the following information:
Allow me to describe this card in detail:
This is the place holder text for the full description of the card. It should include the meaning of the card, without any real interpretation
Here is the placeholder for the text that takes into account the card\'s placement in the spread.
So you would like to know your fortune, hm? \nThen I shall do a three-card reading for you. I will show you insight into your past, your present, and your future.
These words are the meaning of this card when it appears upright. They represent either your past or some event that led you to where you are now:
